"To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often." Winston Churchill

Get ready for awesome improvement in the next months :) 

And we are always looking for users feedback at support@kwit.fr!

We have worked hard to made a whole new Kwit for you, more personalized, more fun and more colorful. We hope you'll enjoy it!

We are looking for your feedback at hello@kwit.app and if you like this new version, please leave us a nice review :)

We update the app regularly to give you a better experience and ease your smoke-free journey.

Thanks to your feedback, we have improved the app!

∙ It now shows the number of weeks, months or years since you quit, and the number of packs you avoided smoking.

∙ Visuals are more contrasted and readable.

∙ Spanish, Dutch, Russian, Italian, German, Turkish, Portuguese and Italian versions now have professional translations (a huge thank you to all the volunteer translators who wrote the previous versions!).

As always, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app.

Happy Kwitting!

We update the app regularly to give you a better experience and ease your smoke-free journey.

We have listened to a lot of you asking for a more vibrant theme and added a dark-blue theme. Now you can even more personalize your experience.

Thanks to Carole Bernard, we have fixed the calculation between achievements and the dashboard!

As always, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app.

We regularly update the app to give you a better experience and ease your smoke-free journey.

We added some fancy gestures for you to use the app more pleasantly. 

Our team has also been busy creating awesome motivation card designs for the Premium users.

Finally, we identified and fixed a few bugs.

As always, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app.

We regularly update the app to give you a better experience and ease your smoke-free journey.

In this version, we have removed the few identified bugs.

We have also translated the application into Spanish and Portuguese from Latin America to help even more smokers around the world to quit smoking.

As always, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app.

To make your life easier, we have updated the settings screen. It is now possible to change your email and your password. You can now also delete your account (although we would be sad to see you leave).

Finally, we have completely revised the motivation cards to make them more fun and colourful and we took this opportunity to add 20 cards for Premium members.

As always, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app.

To offer an even more useful application to all users, we now allow unlimited entries for cravings and possible relapses.

It is also now possible to take personal notes to supplement your weaning diary with anecdotes and key events.

And to get the most out of iOS 13, this version of Kwit is fully compatible with native Dark Mode.

As usual, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app, we love sharing with our users.

Happy Kwitting!

Happy Kwitting!

Great News!

New features are available! Discover them and stack all the odds in your favor to quit smoking for good!

- Nicotine substitutes:
Kwit now makes it possible to follow your nicotine consumption and to be sure to have the right dosage.

- Electronic cigarettes:
You can now measure in detail your consumption of e-liquids and pods to monitor your consumption.

- Cravings toolkit:
New coping strategies have been added to help you overcome your cravings.

We listened to you and you can get motivated again by shaking your phone.

We've also added a new strategy to help you when you feel like smoking a cigarette. 

As usual, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app, we love sharing with our users.

This month, we have spoiled you! We've expanded the choice of strategies for fighting cravings by adding some great breathing exercises.

A few bugs have been fixed, including one that prevented some of you from being recognized as a Premium Member.

This will be the last version that will work on iOS 12. This means that to enjoy future new features, you will need at least iOS 13. Don't hesitate to update iOS!

As usual, if you run into any trouble or want to leave us feedback, contact us at hello@kwit.app, we love sharing with our users.

Happy Kwitting!

We have been working hard to prepare a new version for the beginning of Spring.

On the menu of this version :
- We have added more than 200 objectives to unlock for even more motivation, and we have revised their classification
- From now on, the application takes into account the nicotine intake in the objectives
- The settings screen has been revised to be clearer

We have also fixed many bugs!

As always, if you encounter any problems or if you want to leave us comments, please contact us at hello@kwit.app, we love to talk to our users.

It's summer, and while some of you may be on vacations we have been working very hard to present you this new version. 
It includes different language improvements. 
—Thanks Lucia and Artem!—

Also, we fixed several bugs, including one in Nicotine's objectives —thanks to Leonardo and knackipedro's feedback. Thanks to you!—

We wish you a good vacation. We hope to see you in September with a lot of new features!
As always, if you experience any issues or if you want to leave us a comment, feel free to contact us at hello@kwit.app, we love talking to our users!
